summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley discussing a person named Alexa who is pursuing a PhD in Physics. Staley mentions that Tufts and NYU are interested in her and expresses confidence in her abilities.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email discussing Alexa's academic pursuits.

persons.name: Alexa
persons.context: Alexa is mentioned as a fighter who wants to pursue a PhD in Physics and is being courted by Tufts and NYU.

keyFacts: Jes Staley expresses confidence in Alexa's ability to succeed in her academic pursuits.
Alexa is interested in obtaining a PhD in Physics.
Tufts and NYU are actively soliciting Alexa for her academic career.
